name: Color Balls Jump
description:
Don't eat the first two cubes, or the game is over. You must first eat the cubes next to the helix pipes, and then you can eat the cubes in front of the helix pipes.The concert is accompanied by cubes, and multiple cubes in a row can have unexpected effects.

Color Balls is a simple one touch music game.

Tap to fly your balls avoid the helix pipes. Please note that eating cubes will bounce.

Features:

- Simple 1 Touch Controls
- Beyond the classic existence
- Game center support

How fast are your reaction skills? This fun and fast paced music game will test you to the max.
